startactivities-heading-paragraph: The goal of your part-up is clear now. Do you already have ideas on what needs to be done? It's okay if you don't know it all yet. The other uppers will help you later on to complement the activities.
startactivities-button-adopt_activities: Copy all activities from an existing part-up.
startactivities-form-description-placeho: Let's keep it short and sharp
startactivities-form-end_date-label: Add a date if you like
startactivities-form-end_date-placeholde: Add a date if you like
